channel.title: I killed the scientist near the end. [Fixed]
channel.description:
I decided to mess around and kill the scientist that is supposed to activate the portal to Xen. Well I shot him with a crossbow and I just sat there for a while. I don't know if this has been reported yet but here it is.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4MAZvlImeA[/url]

item.title: I killed the scientist near the end. [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
The flag to trigger the “Failure to preserve mission-critical personnel” on death was missing, but It’s been fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: I killed the scientist near the end. [Fixed]

I dunno why they removed that in BM.
